alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Brunswick; Columbus; Pender; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 2:39PM EST until December 17 at 3:45PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... Central Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Northern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EST. * At 239 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Elizabethtown to near Council, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Elizabethtown, Rowan, Chadbourn, Bladenboro, Lake Waccamaw, Sandyfield, Boardman, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Hallsboro, Bladen Community College, Ammon, Butters, Redbug, Council, Southeastern Community College, White Oak, Riegelwood, and Carvers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina.
